description: Ready made red pesto is a quick way to inject flavour into salmon fillets with a light and crisp breadcrumb topping.
name: Salmon with Red Pesto Crust & Mushy Peas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170°C/150°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with foil, drizzle lightly with oil and place the salmon fillets skin side down on the tray.

In a small bowl, add lemon zest to the red pesto and spread a tablespoon on top of each salmon fillet. Top each with a tablespoon of panko breadcrumbs and grated parmesan. Drizzle with the remaining oil and roast for 15 minutes.

In a large pan, boil the potatoes for 15 minutes and drain. Boil the peas in a separate pan, drain and add mint, garlic, a squeeze a lemon and the creme fraiche. Blitz to a coarse puree with a hand blender.
Serve the salmon fillets with baby potatoes, mushy peas, cracked black pepper and extra lemon slices.
